TopicTitle: IVA Enhanced for KSP future versions?

Articles.Content: Hello future astronauts! When in KSP update history SQUAD put the IVA looked amazing but that was a lot of time ago and now we are in KSP 1.2 but, for future updates will be amazing to move in the interior of the spaceship. I've know that there's a mod to move in the interior of the SpaceShip but I'll like to had this on stock game. The things that I'll like that SQUAD will add is this: 1 Instead of press the EVA button to get out, get out of the seat and do an EVA by opening the door of the command pod. 2 More parts of space stations to move get the Kerbal move there free. This is an idea for you SQUAD. Will be awesome to put this on the game. Thanks .
It would also be cool if you could interact with things, like do science and mess around with Zero-G, if it is possible to do so. I like the idea.
